properties.areaDesc: Scott, VA; Russell, VA; Wise, VA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 6:21AM EST until February 7 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

French Broad River Near Newport TN affecting Cocke and Jefferson
Counties
Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Russell...Scott and Wise
Counties
North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Hawkins...
Sullivan and Scott Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Clinch River At Cleveland VA.
* From this evening until Friday afternoon.
* At 05:45 AM Thursday the stage was 10.3 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 14.5 feet by after midnight tonight. The river will
fall below flood stage by Friday morning.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding affects the pumping station for the water
treatment plant.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
